about_the_game:
Welcome to Zenith Heroes!

Embark on the ultimate test of survival in a world where only the strongest, smartest, and swiftest prevail. Zenith Heroes thrusts you into adrenaline-fueled battles where every decision can mean the difference between victory and defeat. Are you ready to rise to the challenge and become the ultimate champion?

Key Features


1. Battle Royale Reinvented: Experience the next evolution of the Battle Royale genre with Zenith Heroes. Engage in heart-pounding matches where cunning strategy and lightning-fast reflexes are your greatest assets.

2. Dynamic Environments: No two matches are ever the same thanks to our dynamically shifting environments. Adapt to ever-changing landscapes and weather conditions as you fight for survival.

3. Diverse Heroes: Choose from a roster of diverse heroes, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. Whether you prefer to strike from the shadows, dominate from a distance, or charge head-on into battle, there's a hero for every playstyle.

4. Intense Firefights: Engage in adrenaline-pumping firefights against dozens of opponents as you fight to be the last one standing. Utilize a vast array of weapons, gadgets, and tactics to outsmart and outgun your rivals.

5. Team Up or Go Solo: Play solo and prove your skills against the best of the best, or team up with friends and form alliances to increase your chances of survival. The choice is yours, but remember, in Zenith Heroes, trust is a rare commodity.

6. Constant Updates: With regular updates and new content, Zenith Heroes is constantly evolving. Expect fresh challenges, new heroes, and exciting features to keep the action fast and furious.

Are you ready to reach the zenith of gaming greatness? Join the battle in Zenith Heroes and show the world what it takes to be a true hero!

name: Zenith Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 4350 or Equivalent, Intel Core i3 6300 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 7730, NVIDIA GeForce® GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 CPU or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 290, NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
